entry.title: Payment processors that support testnet?
entry.summary: Bitcoin to fiat currency processors such as BitPay and Coinbase allow testing using the bitcoin testnet, according to a question posed on Reddit. The poster noted that most credit card payment processor APIs have features for developers to test without using "real money." However, when it comes to testing end-to-end transactions from BTC to a USD or EU-denominated bank account, the equivalent of this for bitcoin is unclear.
